name: Fight Club (JACKO4590)
description:
Play in full screen to see the whole screen. 

There is no music. With work and sleep I ran out of time to learn how to do my own music. 

I worked alone for this game jam and all scripts and art is made myself.

I got told my last game for a game jam was to hard so I do hope I did better this time. This is based on the battle screen like Final Fantasy and Pokémon. It is a really good concept that could be implemented into a game. I have made the focus around the battle screen only.

If I had more time/motivation I would have polished this a lot more and focused on the potion side to be bigger. AP (action Points) was meant to be a thing to allow you to select more then one action per turn but I did not want to scope too big and miss the game jam.

I hope you enjoy my submission.
